amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.para: Second-class cities and villages shall have power to require any person, firm or corporation operating any public water supply in such city or village to connect with and furnish water to such city or village from its mains located therein, and to provide by ordinance for connections of such mains with the mains or portion of water system constructed or operated by such city or village, under such regulations and under such penalties as may be prescribed therein.
